mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dynamics (user_uid, content, images, create_time, update_time, like_count, comment_count) VALUES (#{userUID}, #{content}, #{images, typeHandler=com.ai.companion.config.JsonTypeHandler}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dynamics ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dynamics WHERE id = #{id} AND user_uid = #{userUID}
mapper.update: UPDATE dynamics SET like_count = #{likeCount} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE dynamics SET comment_count = #{commentCount} WHERE id = #{id}
